TYPES.STORY_TELLER2.CopyIDMessage: The macro for calling the story was copied to the clipboard.
TYPES.STORY_TELLER2.CantCreateFolder: Folder creation is not currently supported, wait for future updates! Thanks for understanding!
TYPES.STORY_TELLER2.Settings.Theme: Change the style of the story
TYPES.STORY_TELLER2.Settings.ThemeHint: Changes the theme for all players
TYPES.STORY_TELLER2.Settings.Size: The size of the story on the screen
TYPES.STORY_TELLER2.Settings.SizeHint: 100% takes up almost the entire screen height, 80% takes up no more than 80% of the screen height
TYPES.STORY_TELLER2.Settings.EnableScrol: Enables scroll support inside the book
BETA. It doesn't look good, but sometimes functionality is more important than beauty. Allows you to scroll the text inside the page
